trait.name: 精類血統
entries: 阿莉希在對抗{@condition 魅惑}的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且魔法無法使她入睡。

trait.name: 哀嚎敗退
entries: 當阿莉希的生命值歸零時，她的身體將在一陣呼嘯著的旋風中消失，且這陣旋風將迅速而無害地消散。任何她所穿戴或攜帶的東西都將被留在原地。

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (2/日)
entries: 若阿莉希在一次豁免檢定中失敗，她可以選擇改為使其成功。

action.name: 風向矛標
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6})穿刺傷害，或若雙手使用以進行一次近戰攻擊時則造成 10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6})穿刺傷害，再額外加上 3 ({@damage 1d6})閃電傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: 阿莉希是12級的施法者。她的施法屬性為智力（法術豁免DC 14，法術攻擊命中{@hit 6}）。阿莉希已準備了以下法師法術：

monster.name: 氣元素追隨者
monster.languages: 氣族語、一種它創造者所選擇的語言

trait.name: 魔法武器
entries: 追隨者的武器攻擊視作魔法攻擊。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 追隨者進行三次連枷攻擊。

action.name: 連枷
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) 鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 閃電猛擊{@recharge}
entries: 追隨者進行一次連枷攻擊。若該攻擊命中，則它將額外造成 18 ({@damage 4d8})閃電傷害，且目標必須成功通過一次DC 14的體質豁免，否則將被{@condition 震懾}直到該追隨者的下個回合結束。

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) 穿刺傷害。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 巴斯汀的天生施法屬性為體質（法術豁免DC 13，法術攻擊命中{@hit 5}）。他天生就可以施展以下法術：

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: 巴斯汀是9級的施法者。它的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 15，法術攻擊命中{@hit 7}）。巴斯汀知曉以下術士法術：

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 守衛進行二次近戰攻擊。

action.name: 釘頭錘
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) 穿刺傷害。

reaction.name: 堅定不移
entries: 當守衛成為一個會強迫他移動或將他擊倒{@condition 伏地}的效果的目標，他可以使用他的反應以避免被強迫移動和擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 祭司進行二次近戰攻擊。

action.name: 長柄刀
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) 劈砍傷害。

reaction.name: 堅定不移
entries: 當祭司成為一個會強迫他移動或將他擊倒{@condition 伏地}的效果的目標，他可以使用他的反應以避免被強迫移動和擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: 祭司是5級的施法者。它的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 13，法術攻擊命中{@hit 5}）。它知曉以下術士法術：

trait.name: 黑土之繫
entries: 穴居鯊衛藉著魔法與一只經過訓練的{@creature 鯊蜥獸}聯繫在一起，並將其做為坐騎。當騎乘於它的{@creature 鯊蜥獸}時，穴居鯊衛將共享鯊蜥獸的感官，並可以在其掘地的同時維持騎乘。該鯊蜥獸服從穴居鯊衛的命令。若它的坐騎死亡，穴居鯊衛可以訓練一只新的鯊蜥獸做為其相繫的坐騎，這個過程將花費一個月的時間。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 穴居鯊衛進行三次近戰攻擊。

action.name: 矛
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎 或射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) 穿刺傷害，或若雙手使用以進行一次近戰攻擊時則造成 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) 穿刺傷害。

reaction.name: 堅定不移
entries: 當穴居鯊衛成為一個會強迫它移動或將它擊倒{@condition 伏地}的效果的目標，它可以使用它的反應以避免被強迫移動和擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

action.name: 長棍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) 鈍擊傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: 祭司是5級的施法者。它的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 13，法術攻擊命中{@hit 5}）。祭司知曉以下術士法術：

action.name: 鯊齒長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) 劈砍傷害，或若以雙手使用時則造成 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) 劈砍傷害。若目標沒有穿戴護甲，則掠奪者將對其額外造成一顆這把劍的傷害骰的傷害。

action.name: 標槍
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎 或 射程30/120呎, 單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) 穿刺傷害。

trait.name: Bonded Mount
entries: The knight is magically bound to a beast with an innate swimming speed trained to serve as its mount. While mounted on this beast, the knight gains the beast's senses and ability to breathe underwater. The bonded mount obeys the knight's commands. If its mount dies, the knight can train a new beast to serve as its bonded mount, a process requiring a month.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: The knight deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the knight that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the knight doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 暗潮騎士進行二次短劍攻擊.

action.name: 短劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) 穿刺傷害。

action.name: Lance
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及10呎，單一目標。 {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) 穿刺傷害。

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: When an attacker the knight can see hits it with an attack, the knight can halve the damage against it.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Drannin takes an additional action on his turn.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Drannin hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Drannin has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Indomitable (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Drannin can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Drannin can use a bonus action to regain 16 ({@dice 1d10 + 11}) hit points.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Drannin wears a control amulet for his {@creature shield guardian} (see the Monster Manual) and a {@item ring of cold resistance}. He also carries a {@item potion of frost giant strength}.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: Drannin makes three attacks with his greataxe.

action.name: 巨斧
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) 劈砍傷害。

monster.name: 土元素追隨者
monster.languages: 土族語、一種它創造者所選擇的語言

trait.name: 魔法武器
entries: 追隨者的武器攻擊視作魔法攻擊。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 追隨者進行二次巨鎚攻擊。

action.name: 巨鎚
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) 鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Thunderous Strike {@recharge}
entries: The myrmidon makes one maul attack. If the attack hits, it deals an extra 16 ({@damage 3d10}) thunder damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Summon Mephits (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: By puffing on his pipe, Elizar can use an action to cast {@spell conjure minor elementals}. If he does so, he summons four smoke mephits.

action.name: Dagger +1
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎 或射程 20/60 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) 穿刺傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: Elizar is a 7th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Elizar has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Flaming Weapon (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the guard can wreath one melee weapon it is wielding in flame. The guard is unharmed by this fire, which lasts until the end of the guard's next turn. While wreathed in flame, the weapon deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage on a hit.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 可以進行兩次近戰攻擊

action.name: 長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) 劈砍傷害。

action.name: 重弩
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 3}，射程 100/400 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) 穿刺傷害。

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎 或射程 20/60 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) 穿刺傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its 的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 13，法術攻擊命中{@hit 5}）。 It knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Shapechanger (2/Day)
entries: The fathomer can use its action to polymorph into a Medium serpent composed of water, or back into its true form. Anything the fathomer is wearing or carrying is subsumed into the serpent form during the change, inaccessible until the fathomer returns to its true form. The fathomer reverts to its true form after 4 hours, unless it can expend another use of this trait. If the fathomer is knocked {@condition unconscious} or dies, it also reverts to its true form.

While in serpent form, the fathomer gains a swimming speed of 40 feet, the ability to breathe underwater, immunity to poison damage, as well as resistance to fire damage and bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks. It also has immunity to the following conditions: {@condition exhaustion}, {@condition grappled}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition poisoned}, {@condition restrained}, {@condition prone}, {@condition unconscious}. The serpent form can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if water can pass through a space, the serpent can do so without squeezing.

trait.name: Olhydra's Armor (Human Form Only)
entries: The fathomer can cast {@spell 法師護甲} at will, without expending material components.

action.name: Constrict (Serpent Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) 鈍擊傷害。 If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 12). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the fathomer can't constrict another target.

action.name: Dagger (Human Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎 或射程 20/60 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) 穿刺傷害。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Human Form Only)
headerEntries: The fathomer is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its 的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 12，法術攻擊命中{@hit 4}）。 It has two 3rd-level spell slots, which it regains after finishing a short or long rest, and knows the following warlock spells:

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 可以進行兩次近戰攻擊

action.name: 長劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: 矛
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎 或射程 20/60 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: The knight is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its 的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 12，法術攻擊命中{@hit 4}）。 It knows the following sorcerer spell:

monster.name: 火元素追隨者
monster.languages: Ignan, one language of its creator's choice

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The myrmidon sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in a 40-foot radius.

trait.name: 魔法武器
entries: 追隨者的武器攻擊視作魔法攻擊。

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the myrmidon moves in water, it takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) cold damage.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The myrmidon makes three scimitar attacks.

action.name: 彎刀
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) 劈砍傷害。

action.name: Fiery Strikes {@recharge}
entries: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Wreathed in Flame
entries: For the flamewrath, the warm version of the {@spell 火焰護盾} spell has a duration of "until dispelled." The fire shield burns for 10 minutes after the flamewrath dies, consuming its body.

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎 或射程 20/60 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) 穿刺傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: The flamewrath is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its 的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 14，法術攻擊命中{@hit 6}）。 It knows the following sorcerer spells:

spells: {@spell 火焰護盾} (see Wreathed in Flame)

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Gar can breathe air and water.

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (2/日)
entries: 豁免失敗時，可以取代為成功的結果。

trait.name: Water Walk
entries: Gar can stand and move on liquid surfaces as if they were solid ground.

trait.name: Watery Fall
entries: When Gar drops to 0 hit points, his body collapses into a pool of inky water that rapidly disperses. Anything he was wearing or carrying is left behind.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: Gar makes two melee attacks, one with his claw and one with Drown.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 13). Until the grapple ends, Gar can't attack other creatures with his claw.

action.name: Drown
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎 或射程 20/60 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage.

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: Gar is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Ghald scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: Ghald can breathe air and water, but he needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: Ghald can magically command any shark within 120 feet of him, using a limited telepathy.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Ghald deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Ghald's that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Ghald doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: Ghald makes three attacks, one with his bite and two with his shortswords.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及 5 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) 穿刺傷害。

action.name: 短劍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及 5 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) 穿刺傷害。

action.name: Garrote
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及 5 ft., one Medium or Small creature against which Ghald has advantage on the attack roll. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target can't breathe, and Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against it.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Hellenrae is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

trait.name: Stunning Strike {@recharge 5}
entries: When Hellenrae hits a target with a melee weapon attack, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of Hellenrae's next turn.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

trait.name: Unarmored Movement
entries: While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her speed increases by 20 feet (included in her speed).

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 可以進行三次近戰攻擊

action.name: 徒手打擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) 鈍擊傷害。

reaction.name: Parry and Counter
entries: Hellenrae adds 3 to her AC against one melee or ranged weapon attack that would hit her. To do so, she must be able to sense the attacker with her blindsight. If the attack misses, Hellenrae can make one melee attack against the attacker if it is within her reach.

trait.name: Guiding Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the initiate gains advantage on the next ranged attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The initiate can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎 或射程 20/60 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) 穿刺傷害。

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The priest can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 可以進行兩次近戰攻擊或是兩次遠程攻擊.

action.name: 彎刀
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) 劈砍傷害。

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎 或射程 20/60 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) 穿刺傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its 的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 12，法術攻擊命中{@hit 4}）。 It knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the hurricane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

trait.name: Unarmored Movement
entries: While the hurricane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its walking speed increases by 15 feet (included in its speed).

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 可以進行兩次近戰攻擊

action.name: 徒手打擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) 鈍擊傷害。

reaction.name: Deflect Missiles
entries: When the hurricane is hit by a ranged weapon attack, it reduces the damage from the attack by {@dice 1d10 + 9}. If the damage is reduced to 0, the hurricane can catch the missile if it is small enough to hold in one hand and the hurricane has at least one hand free.

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: The hurricane is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Empowered Attacks
entries: Imix's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: At the start of each of Imix's turns, each creature within 10 feet of him takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature also takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage if it touches Imix or hits him with a melee attack while within 10 feet of him, and a creature takes that damage the first time on a turn that Imix moves into its space. Nonmagical weapons that hit Imix are destroyed by fire immediately after dealing damage to him

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: Imix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. He can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing if fire could pass through that space.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: Imix sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius and dim light for an additional 60 feet.

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: 豁免失敗時，可以取代為成功的結果。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Imix has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: Imix makes two slam attacks or two flame blast attacks.

action.name: 猛擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 12}，觸及10呎，單一目標。 {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Flame Blast
entries: {@atk rs} 命中{@hit 12}，射程 250 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Summon Elementals (1/Day)
entries: Imix summons up to three fire elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Imix, and disappear if Imix is reduced to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Heat Wave
entries: Imix creates a blast of heat within 300 feet of himself. Each creature in the area in physical contact with metal objects (for example, carrying metal weapons or wearing metal armor) takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage. Each creature in the area that isn't resistant or immune to fire damage must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or gain one level of {@condition exhaustion}.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Imix magically teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Anything Imix is wearing or carrying isn't teleported with him.

legendary.name: Combustion (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Imix causes one creature he can see within 30 feet of him to burst into flames. The target must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 70 ({@damage 20d6}) fire damage and catches fire. A target on fire takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage when it starts its turn, and remains on fire until it or another creature takes an action to douse the flames. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and doesn't catch fire.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 伊密克斯的天生施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 20，法術攻擊命中{@hit 12}）。他天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何材料構材：

trait.name: Earthen Defeat
entries: When Marlos drops to 0 hit points, his body transforms into mud and collapses into a pool. Anything he is wearing or carrying is left behind.

trait.name: Earth Passage
entries: Marlos can move in difficult terrain composed of anything made from earth or stone as if it were normal terrain. He can move through solid earth and rock as if it were difficult terrain. If he ends his turn there, he is shunted into the nearest space he last occupied.

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (2/日)
entries: 豁免失敗時，可以取代為成功的結果。

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see Marlos's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of him, Marlos can force it to make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw if Marlos isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly {@condition petrified}. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming {@condition petrified} on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see Marlos until the start of its next turn, when it can decide to avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at Marlos in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If Marlos sees himself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet of him and in an area of bright light, Marlos is, due to his curse, affected by his own gaze.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: Marlos makes three melee attacks, one with his snake hair and two with Ironfang.

action.name: Snake Hair
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Ironfang
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) thunder damage.

trait.name: Earth Walk
entries: Moving through difficult terrain made of earth or stone costs Miraj no extra movement.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: Miraj's innate spellcasting ability is Constitution (spell save DC 14). He can innately cast the following spell, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: Miraj 是11級的施法者。His 的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 15，法術攻擊命中{@hit 7}）。 He knows the following sorcerer spells:

spells: {@spell 馬克西米利安大地之攫|xge}

trait.name: Empowered Attacks
entries: Ogrémoch's slam attacks are treated as magical and adamantine for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: 豁免失敗時，可以取代為成功的結果。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Ogrémoch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Ogrémoch deals double damage to objects and structures with his melee and ranged weapon attacks.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: Ogrémoch makes two slam attacks.

action.name: 猛擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 14}，觸及15呎，單一目標。 {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) 鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Boulder
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 6}，射程 500 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}46 ({@damage 7d10 + 8}) 鈍擊傷害。 If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Summon Elementals (1/Day)
entries: Ogrémoch summons up to three earth elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Ogrémoch, and disappear if Ogrémoch is reduced to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Illuminating Crystals
entries: Ogrémoch's crystalline protrusions flare. Each creature within 30 feet of Ogrémoch becomes outlined in orange light, shedding dim light in a 10-foot radius. Any attack roll against an affected creature has advantage if the attacker can see it, and the affected creature can't benefit from being {@condition invisible}.

legendary.name: Stomp (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Ogrémoch stomps the ground, creating an earth tremor that extends in a 30-foot radius. Other creatures standing on the ground in that radius must succeed on a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Create Gargoyle (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Ogrémoch's hit points are reduced by 50 as he breaks off a chunk of his body and places it on the ground in an unoccupied space within 15 feet of him. The chunk of rock instantly transforms into a gargoyle and acts on the same initiative count as Ogrémoch. Ogrémoch can't use this action if he has 50 hit points or fewer. The gargoyle obeys Ogrémoch's commands and fights until destroyed.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: Ogrémoch's innate 的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 20，法術攻擊命中{@hit 12}）。 He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Empowered Attacks
entries: Olhydra's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: If Olhydra fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Olhydra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Water Form
entries: Olhydra can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. She can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: Olhydra makes two slam attacks or two water jet attacks.

action.name: 猛擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 11}，觸及10呎，單一目標。 {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 19). Olhydra can grapple up to four targets. When Olhydra moves, all creatures she is grappling move with her.

action.name: Water Jet
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 12}，射程 120 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone} if it fails a DC 19 Strength saving throw.

action.name: Summon Elementals (1/Day)
entries: Olhydra summons up to three water elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental she summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Olhydra, and disappear if Olhydra is reduced to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Crush
entries: One creature that Olhydra is grappling is crushed for 21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) 鈍擊傷害。

legendary.name: Fling (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Olhydra releases one creature she is grappling by flinging the creature up to 60 feet away from her, in a direction of her choice. If the flung creature comes into contact with a solid surface, such as a wall or floor, the creature takes {@dice 1d6} bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was flung.

legendary.name: Water to Acid (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Olhydra transforms her watery body into acid. This effect lasts until Olhydra's next turn. Any creature that comes into contact with Olhydra or hits her with a melee attack while standing within 5 feet of her takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) acid damage. Any creature {@condition grappled} by Olhydra takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) acid damage at the start of its turn.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: Olhydra's innate 的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 20，法術攻擊命中{@hit 12}）。 She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Chilling Mist
entries: While it is alive, the one-eyed shiver projects an aura of cold mist within 10 feet of itself. If the one-eyed shiver deals damage to a creature in this area, the creature also takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage.

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎 或射程 20/60 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) 穿刺傷害。

action.name: Eye of Frost
entries: The one-eyed shiver casts ray of frost from its missing eye. If it hits, the target is also {@condition restrained}. A target {@condition restrained} in this way can end the condition by using an action, succeeding on a DC 13 Strength check.

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: The one-eyed shiver is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its 的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 13，法術攻擊命中{@hit 5}）。 It knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Grim Harvest
entries: Once per turn when Oreioth kills one or more creatures with a spell of 1st level or higher, he regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level.

trait.name: Swift Animation (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: When a living Medium or Small humanoid within 30 feet of Oreioth dies, he can use an action on his next turn to cast {@spell 活化死屍} on that humanoid's corpse, instead of using the spell's normal casting time.

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) 穿刺傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: Oreioth is a 6th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Searing Armor
entries: The razerblast's armor is hot. Any creature grappling the razerblast or {@condition grappled} by it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the end of that creature's turn.

trait.name: Shrapnel Explosion
entries: When the razerblast drops to 0 hit points, a flaming orb in its chest explodes, destroying the razerblast's body and scattering its armor as shrapnel. Creatures within 10 feet of the razerblast when it explodes must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 可以進行三次近戰攻擊

action.name: 矛
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎 或射程 20/60 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

trait.name: Unarmored Movement
entries: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its walking speed increases by 10 feet (included in its speed).

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 可以進行兩次近戰攻擊

action.name: 徒手打擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) 鈍擊傷害。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The monk adds 2 to its AC against one melee or ranged weapon attack that would hit it. To do so, the monk must see the attacker.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Shoalar can breathe air and water.

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎 或射程d 20/60 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) 穿刺傷害。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: Shoalar's innate spellcasting ability is Constitution (spell save DC 13, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells:

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: Shoalar is a 5th-level spellcaster. His 的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 13，法術攻擊命中{@hit 5}）。 He knows the following sorcerer spells:

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎 或射程 20/60 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) 穿刺傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: The Skyweaver is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its 的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 13，法術攻擊命中{@hit 5}）。 It knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the Stonemelder dies, it turns to stone and explodes in a burst of rock shards, becoming a smoking pile of rubble. Each creature within 10 feet of the exploding Stonemelder must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Black Earth Rod
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) 鈍擊傷害。 The Stonemelder can also expend a spell slot to deal extra damage, dealing {@dice 2d8} bludgeoning damage for a 1st level slot, plus an additional {@dice 1d8} for each level of the slot above 1st.

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: The Stonemelder is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its 的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 13，法術攻擊命中{@hit 5}）。 It knows the following sorcerer spells:

spells: {@spell 馬克西米利安大地之攫|xge}

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 可以進行兩次近戰攻擊

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) 劈砍傷害。

action.name: Lance
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及10呎，單一目標。 {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) 穿刺傷害。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Thurl adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Thurl must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: Thurl is a 5th-level spellcaster. His 的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 12，法術攻擊命中{@hit 4}）。 Thurl knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Funeral Pyre
entries: When Vanifer drops to 0 hit points, her body is consumed in a flash of fire and smoke. Anything she was wearing or carrying is left behind among ashes.

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (2/日)
entries: If Vanifer fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: Vanifer makes two attacks.

action.name: Tinderstrike
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎 或射程 20/60 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: Vanifer is a 10th-level spellcaster. 她的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 16，法術攻擊命中{@hit 8}）。 Vanifer knows the following sorcerer spells:

monster.name: 水元素追隨者
monster.languages: Aquan, one language of its creator's choice

trait.name: 魔法武器
entries: 追隨者的武器攻擊視作魔法攻擊。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The myrmidon makes three trident attacks.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) 穿刺傷害。

action.name: Freezing Strikes {@recharge}
entries: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

trait.name: Brave Devotion
entries: Wiggan has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: Wiggan makes two attacks with his wooden cane.

action.name: Wooden Cane
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} to hit ({@hit 4} to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 呎, 單一目標。 {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: Wiggan is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: 精類血統
entries: Windharrow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 可以進行兩次近戰攻擊

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) 穿刺傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: Windharrow 是8級的施法者。他的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 13，法術攻擊命中{@hit 5}）。 Windharrow知曉以下吟遊詩人法術：

trait.name: Air Form
entries: Yan-C-Bin can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. He can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing if air could pass through that space.

trait.name: Empowered Attacks
entries: Yan-C-Bin's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: 若延希賓在一次豁免檢定中失敗，它可以選擇改為使其成功。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Yan-C-Bin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 延希賓進行二次猛擊攻擊。

action.name: 猛擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 14}，觸及10呎，單一目標。 {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) 力場傷害加 10 ({@damage 3d6})閃電傷害。

action.name: Thundercrack (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Yan-C-Bin unleashes a terrible thundercrack in a 100-foot-radius sphere centered on himself. All other creatures in the area must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or take 31 ({@damage 9d6}) thunder damage and be {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is {@condition deafened} until the start of Yan-C-Bin's next turn.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: Yan-C-Bin polymorphs into a Medium humanoid. While in polymorphed form, a swirling breeze surrounds him, his eyes are pale and cloudy, and he loses the Air Form trait. He can remain in polymorphed form for up to 1 hour. Reverting to his true form requires an action.

action.name: Summon Elementals (1/Day)
entries: Yan-C-Bin summons up to three air elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Yan-C-Bin, and disappear if Yan-C-Bin is reduced to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Peal of Thunder
entries: Yan-C-Bin unleashes a peal of thunder that can be heard out to a range of 300 feet. Each creature within 30 feet of Yan-C-Bin takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) thunder damage.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Yan-C-Bin magically teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Anything Yan-C-Bin is wearing or carrying is teleported with him.

legendary.name: Suffocate (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Yan-C-Bin steals the air of one breathing creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target drops to 0 hit points and is dying. On a successful save, the target can't breathe or speak until the start of its next turn.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: Yan-C-Bin's innate 的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 20，法術攻擊命中{@hit 12}）。 He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
